results.title: Comparison of different drug for reducing testosterone levels in women with polycystic ovary syndrome: A systematic review and network meta-analysis
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, typically used to treat @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, have demonstrated comparable effectiveness to other antiandrogen agents in reducing androgen levels in @SPECIES_9606 @@@women@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.

citations.NLM: Hao SL, Zhang CL, Meng XY. Comparison of different drug for reducing testosterone levels in women with polycystic ovary syndrome: A systematic review and network meta-analysis Medicine (Baltimore). 2023 Oct 13;102(41):e35152. PMID: 37832133

results.title: Bridging gap in treatment of polycystic ovarian syndrome through drug repurposing: what we achieved and where we are?
results.text_hl: Drugs from different pharmacological classes like antidiabetics (@CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Rosiglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077154 @@@rosiglitazone@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@, and semaglutide), statins (@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@), antiandrogen drugs (@CHEMICAL_Finasteride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018120 @@@finasteride@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Flutamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005485 @@@flutamide@@@), etc. demonstrated significant potential in managing @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@.

citations.NLM: Kumbhar PS, Chavan R, Darekar S, Kolekar K, Sequeira A, Vishwas S, Gupta G, Paudel KR, Singh SK, Dua K, Disouza J, Patravale V. Bridging gap in treatment of polycystic ovarian syndrome through drug repurposing: what we achieved and where we are? Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2024 Nov 9;():. PMID: 39520555

results.title: Comparison of the effects of metformin, flutamide plus oral contraceptives, and simvastatin on the metabolic consequences of polycystic ovary syndrome
results.text_hl: In a study on @<m>DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@PCOS@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ declined @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@ considerably.
